title: Remaining Piedmont Art Stamps - w/ pricing
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: Remaining Piedmont Art Stamps - w/ pricing
posts.post_content:
Here are the ones that are left ...and prices

Wilson - cardinals - Good  - $150 SOLD
Archer - cubs - vg/ex+ but staining/toning to back - $250
Fisher - NY amer - G/VG - $200 SOLD
Killefer - Phila - appears Ex but staining/toning to back - $300 SOLD
Lord - Chi. - Poor - $60 SOLD
Leach - cubs - Poor+ - $75 SOLD
Devore - Phila - Poor- - $50 SOLD
Oldring - Phila - Poor - $60 SOLD
Blair - Buff - Poor+ - $75 HOLD
Evers - Braves - WOW!!! between Ex - NM Tiny stain on reverse (A card in this shape is shocking) - $1500
Austin - St. Louis - Poor - $60 SOLD
Groom - Stl. - Poor - $60 SOLD
Rowan - reds - VG- - $300 SOLD
Oakes - Pitts - Poor - $60 SOLD
Scott - Chi - F/G - $125 SOLD
Eagan - Superbas - Ex - Ex/Mt (another relatively insane card) - $1200

Hi,

Could you hold Oakes & Lord pending back scans?

Thanks,

Mike

Can you hold blair for me...pending back scan as well, please?

[url]ullmandds@gmail.com[/url]

Wow Scott, that Eagan is gorgeous!  Too bad I can't afford it right now.

Good luck with the sale.
